description:
The 125 ZoneKnit™ Short Sleeve Tee IB Topo is icebreaker’s most breathable and lightweight active tee designed for running, biking and other high-exertion activities. This lightweight tee features ZoneKnit™ engineered body mapping, combining Cool-Lite™ jersey fabric with strategic panels of Cool-Lite™ eyelet mesh on the back and sleeves for enhanced breathability and temperature regulation when you're on the move. Offset shoulder seams reduce friction when wearing a pack. The natural camo print adds a high-performance feel.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL™ Lyocell, sourced from eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Merino 125 ZoneKnit SS Tee IB Topo - Mens

specs.value: 60% Lyocell, 40% Merino Wool - Exclusive of decoration
